items.sentence: I could prevent Tom from doing that if I wanted to.
Tom asked Mary to translate the letter into French.
Tom lost everything in a series of bad investments.
Tom assured Mary everything had been taken care of.
Tom asked the waiter some questions about the menu.
That's a question that can best be answered by Tom.
Tom was planning to go until Mary asked him not to.
Tom said that he was looking forward to your visit.
Tom needs to stop pretending he understands French.
Tom would get that job if he were fluent in French.
